rare adjective
(NOT COMMON)

B1 not common or frequent; very unusual: a rare disease/species The museum is full of rare and precious treasures. a rare occasion/opportunity/visit/treat, etc. [ + to infinitive ] It's very rare to find these birds in New England in winter. It's very rare to find someone who combines such qualities.
